item.title: Millions of Londoners Face Transit Disruption as Tube Strike Takes Effect
item.description: A days-long strike on the London Underground over pay and conditions began in earnest on Monday, threatening to upend commuter journeys for most of th...

item.title: Shooting in Jerusalem Leaves at Least 5 Dead
item.description: The Israeli police described the incident as a terrorist attack and said that the perpetrators had been killed at the scene.

item.title: Two Are Killed During Demonstrations Over Social Media Ban in Nepal
item.description: Protesters stormed the Parliament complex days after the government banned most social media platforms. Dozens of others were injured.

item.title: Brazilians Protest as Bolsonaro Coup Trial Nears Verdict
item.description: Tensions are heating up in Brazil as the nation enters the final week of former President Jair Bolsonaroâ€™s trial on attempted coup charges.
